item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Abraham Maslow
item.description: "A musician must make music, an artist must paint, a poet must write, if he is to be ultimately at peace with himself. What a man can be, he must be" -- Abraham Maslow

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Isak Dinesen
amel sherif add a quote by Jane Hamilton
item.description: "It is books that are a key to the wide world; if you can't do anything else, read all that you can." -- Jane Hamilton

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today." -- Malcolm X

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "Truth is on the side of the oppressed." -- Malcolm X

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "My alma mater was books, a good library.... I could spend the rest of my life reading, just satisfying my curiosity." -- Malcolm X

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Science without religion is lame, religion without science is blind." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description:
"Seven Deadly Sins
Wealth without work Pleasure without conscience Science without humanity Knowledge without character Politics without principle Commerce without morality Worship without sacrifice." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Niels Bohr
item.description: "An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field." -- Niels Bohr

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "God does not play dice with the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: amel sherif add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Women and cats will do as they please, and men and dogs should relax and get used to the idea." -- Robert A. Heinlein
